search.query: | rest splunk_server=local /services/server/info | table splunk_server instance_type | eval rest_endpoint=case(instance_type=="cloud", "/services/data/distributed-indexes", true(), "/services/data/indexes")

| `compute_user_to_indexes` | join username [| rest splunk_server=local /services/authentication/users | `prettymv(roles)` | rename title AS username| fields username, roles] | makemv delim=", " roles | makemv delim=", " accessible_indexes | mvexpand roles | mvexpand accessible_indexes | eval searchLit=if(match("$index$" ,"^_\w+$"), "_*", "*") | where accessible_indexes=searchLit OR accessible_indexes=$index$ | fields - accessible_indexes, searchLit
| rest $rest_endpoint$ | fields title | dedup title | sort title
| stats count by username | stats count
| stats count by roles | stats count

| rest $rest_endpoint$/$index$ | rename archiver.* AS * | eval archive_enabled=case(isnotnull(coldStorageProvider), "yes, DDAA", isnotnull(selfStorageBucket), "yes, DDSS", coldToFrozenScript!="", "yes, coldToFrozenScript", coldToFrozenDir!="", "yes, coldToFrozenDir", true(), "no"), splunk_server=if(match(splunk_server, "\.splunkcloud.com$"), "Splunk Cloud", splunk_server) | fields title, splunk_server, frozenTimePeriodInSecs, maxTotalDataSizeMB, archive_enabled | eval frozenTimePeriodInSecs=(frozenTimePeriodInSecs/60/60/24)." days" | eval maxTotalDataSizeMB=tostring(maxTotalDataSizeMB/2014, "commas")." GB" | rename maxTotalDataSizeMB AS "max index size" frozenTimePeriodInSecs AS "max index retention" archive_enabled AS "data archive" title AS index splunk_server AS "search peer"
| fields roles | dedup roles | rename roles AS role

| metadata type=$summary_type$s index=$index$ | eval retention=tostring(abs(lastTime-firstTime), "duration") | convert ctime(firstTime) ctime(lastTime) | sort lastTime | rename totalCount AS "event count" firstTime AS "first event" lastTime AS "last event" $summary_type$ AS name | eval index="$index$" | fields type, index, name, "event count", "first event", "last event", retention
